report.title: MNHNL Samples List
report.description: Form Internal Report: Used by the Surveys grid to retrieve the top level samples associated with a survey.
report.query: SELECT s.id, l.name as location_name, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type, (select int_value as num_visit from sample_attribute_values sav where sav.sample_id = s.id and sav.deleted = FALSE and sav.sample_attribute_id = #visit_attr_id# limit 1) as num_visit, (select count(*) as num_occurrences from samples cs where cs.parent_id = s.id and cs.deleted = FALSE) as num_occurrences, (select count(distinct o.taxa_taxon_list_id) as num_taxa from samples cs, occurrences o where cs.parent_id = s.id and cs.deleted = FALSE AND o.sample_id = cs.id and o.deleted = FALSE) as num_taxa, (select int_value as closed from sample_attribute_values sav where sav.sample_id = s.id and sav.deleted = FALSE and sav.sample_attribute_id = #closed_attr_id# limit 1) as closed FROM samples s LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id WHERE s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id is null AND ('#use_location_list#'::text = 'NO'::text OR (l.id in (#locations#))) #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for?
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: visit_attr_id
param.display: Sample Attribute ID for Visit Number:
param.description: ID of sample_attribute for visit number

param.name: closed_attr_id
param.display: Sample Attribute ID for Closed flag:
param.description: ID of sample_attribute for sample closed flag

param.name: use_location_list
param.description: Restrict query to Locations included in location list.

param.name: locations
param.display: Location ID list (set to -1 if not being used):
param.description: Comma separated list of IDs of locations to restrict query to
